price: Enti due nka wͻn a wͻ’po (nokorε) no wͻ wͻn Da a yahyε wͻn ho bͻ no mu.
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimu alladhī yūʿadūna
